attributes.action: Require that for each new car purchesed a car is scrapped
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a measure to reduce the numbr of cars on our roads, require that for each new car sold an old car is scrapped. This may be any car registered on the DVLA system, Accident damged or not, regardless of how long it has been off the road.
